full_summary:
# Government Tender Notification

## Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for Cube Van and Reefer Van Rentals
### Solicitation Number : WS4483223503
#### Publication Date:  March 26, 2024
#### Tender Closing Date: April 16, 2024 @ 2:00 PM EDT

**Overview:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires Cube Van and Reefer Van rental services on an “as and when” required basis. The contract will facilitate transportation solutions for the Department.

## Contract Details
* expected Contract Start Date: April 15, 2024
* Contract Duration: Ongoing with no fixed end date
* Contract Type: Request for Standing Offer (RSO)
* Trade Agreements: This procurement is covered under various trade agreements including the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

## Technical Qualifications and Evaluation Criteria

* The evaluation will be conducted on a competitively selected basis
* The lowest price will be determined as the determining factor in selecting a contract

## Location and Delivery Point
* Contractual deliveries will take place within Canada
* Renters will provide transportation services to designated sites within Canada

## Contact Information
* Karen Bromley, (elle-la/the Mitie (SPAC/PSPC) contact):
    * Telephone: N/A
    * Email: karen.bromley@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* For More Information pertaining to this RSO: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19218265](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19218265)
* All contracting-related queries should be directed to Karen Bromley.
